entry.title: Give Me Your TMI
entry.summary:
Author: YoonNari

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: A new solo artist from America, "Mimi", debuts under JYP Entertainment. To boost her exposure, Stray Kids are hired to perform alongside her for her debut single. During their first meeting, the 8 members immediately take a special interest in her. As they spend the next month preparing for her debut, a genuine friendship develops between Miyeong and Stray Kids, them promising to maintain their support and close friendships while she grows in her career. However, it's later revealed that due to budgeting issues, JYP has no housing available for Miyoung. With no other option, she's forced to move into the Stray Kids penthouse until further notice.

entry.title: Pretty When You Lie
entry.summary:
Author: Binbin_bean

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,215Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Chan owns a cozy little caf√© called ‚ÄúHome Brew.‚Äù It‚Äôs the kind of place where people overshare their lives between sips of coffee. Everyone adores Chan ‚Äî kind, soft-spoken, always remembering customers‚Äô orders ‚Äî but Minho sees something off.Because Minho isn‚Äôt there for coffee.He‚Äôs there undercover.There have been a series of slow, subtle poisonings in the area, all linked to drinks or pastries from that same caf√© ‚Äî though no proof has ever surfaced. Minho, a detective who prides himself on reading people, is assigned to investigate.Except‚Ä¶ Chan doesn‚Äôt act like a killer. He‚Äôs warm. He‚Äôs lonely. And when he looks at Minho, there‚Äôs recognition. Something quiet and dangerous.As Minho gets closer, the story teeters between affection and suspicion ‚Äî are the smiles real, or bait? And when the final cup is poured, Minho realizes he‚Äôs in too deep: in love, or in danger ‚Äî maybe both.Or: A detective walks into a caf√© to catch a killer.He ends up falling for the man who might be one.

entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: ApparentlyStray

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,515Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Rose‚Äôs hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Rose‚Äôs mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them. ¬† This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.
